adHeader: Affordable Professional Landscaping and Gardening Services
adDetails: Affordable & Professional Landscaping and Gardening Services Full licensed, bonded and insured. Services: - General maintenance: weekly, biweekly, monthly - Gardening service & clean-ups - Tree: trimming, pruning, removing, shaping - Japanese garden specialist (bonsai & more) - Sprinkler systems: repair, replace, installation (manual and automatic, time control systems) - Landscaping, planting, ground cover, seeding & sodding - Decking, patios concrete & brick work, flagstone, mow strips & retaining walls - Fencing: all types of fencing & gating from wood to chain-link * Also low maintenance landscaping & water-less landscaping options About us: 20+ years of experience working in the Bay Area. High quality service for residential/commercial needs. Complete design & build program. Expert landscaping teams. Reliable & professional. FREE ESTIMATES & negotiable pricing.
